class.name: Video
class.author: Christopher Swenson
class.description: Wrapper class around the HTML video tag for displaying MP4 video

constructor.param: style data to pass to the video
Should the video begin playing as soon as it's loaded?

class.property: Is the video set to auto play?
The internal reference to the html5 video tag

event.name: onTick

param.name: time
param.description: The current time position of the video

event.description: Fires at a regular interval as the video progresses

event.name: onComplete
event.description: Fires when the video file has completed

param.name: src
param.description: The file that triggered the error

method.name: play
method.description: Changes the state of the video to playing

method.name: pause
method.description: Changes the state of the video to paused
